description:
InternsGoPro offers a 5-hour training to master the job hunt and develop your interpersonal skills. The workshop trains you on strategies and tools to search, network, apply smartly as well as excel in the job interview. You will take part in many simulations of recruitment situations, get very specific feedback on how to adapt your behaviour, make the right impressions and how to best convey your strengths to fit the employer’s expectations. The workshop will take place saturday (22.3) from 2-5 pm and tuesday (25.3) from 7-9 pm. 

Programme
 Smart search & networking: How to find opportunities & network successfully with confidence
 Applying: Tips and tricks when writing your application and CV, including CV-checks
 The Job Interview: How to prepare, make the best impression & avoid pitfalls
 The recruiter: Understanding what recruiters look for and how to talk to them
 Negotiation: Negotiating your contract and understanding your value for the organisation Methodology

For detailed information check out: http://bit.ly/1cVj64g

or visit us on Facebook: internsgopro

The workshop will take place on other dates of the month
name: Simulate job interviews and improve your skills
